description:
Brought to you by the Department of Health – Abu Dhabi 


Sahatna is your all-in-one app for managing health and wellness in Abu Dhabi. Whether you’re booking doctor appointments, checking lab results, tracking wellness goals, or accessing your insurance details — Sahatna brings everything together in one secure and convenient place. 

With Sahatna’s AI Patient Assistant, you can explore your health records more confidently, receive wellness guidance, and better understand your symptoms — all while staying in control of your data. Connect your wearables to unlock smart goals, stay motivated, and take charge of your health every day.



Key Features: 

• Book Appointments: Schedule in-person or teleconsultation visits with doctors across various healthcare facilities. 

• Manage Dependent Profiles: Link your children and dependents to your account. Securely share access to your and your dependents’ health profiles. 

• View Health Records: Access lab results, diagnoses, prescriptions, and more. 

• Wellness Insights: Sync your wearables for AI-powered smart goals and progress tracking. 

• Prescriptions: View and manage your medications easily. 

• Health Insurance Card: Always have your insurance details at your fingertips. 

• AI Patient Assistant: Get help understanding your medical records, receive symptom guidance, and explore wellness tips. 

• Primary Care: View your registered primary care providers and book appointments directly with them. Sahatna encourages users to have their primary provider as the first step to healthcare and a trusted partner in health for all family throughout all stages of life. 

• IFHAS (Integrated Free Health Assessment Service): 
• Users can explore educational content about IFHAS and learn how preventive health assessments support long-term wellness. 

• Notifications: Get reminders for appointments, health updates, and more. 



To use Sahatna, you’ll need to sign in using UAE PASS for secure access. 

For support or feedback, email sahatna@doh.gov.ae or call us at +971 2 404 5550. 
For more information, visit https://sahatna-app.doh.gov.ae/. 

Download Sahatna today!

Aster DM Healthcare, one of the largest and most trusted healthcare providers in the UAE, introduces the myAster app – My Health in My Hands. Seamlessly manage your healthcare needs, whether booking in-clinic or online doctor consultations, accessing lab reports, or shopping for health, wellness, and beauty products through the integrated online pharmacy.

Key Features:

Doctor Appointments Made Easy:
Book in-clinic or video consultations with Aster doctors from the comfort of your home.
Search and filter doctors by specialty, location, gender, and language.
Quick booking for the earliest available appointments.
Reschedule or cancel appointments with ease.
Receive appointment notifications via SMS and email.

Online Pharmacy at Your Fingertips:
Browse a wide selection of health, wellness, and beauty products.
Enjoy free delivery of your favorite healthcare essentials.
Earn 4 Secure Points for every AED spent and redeem them for future purchases.

Comprehensive Health Management:
View and download lab test results and scan reports directly from the app.
Manage health profiles for yourself and your family members.
Link multiple insurance profiles for a seamless payment experience.

Exclusive Benefits:
Free follow-up video consultations within 7 days of your initial appointment.
Stay connected with doctors through video consultations from anywhere in the UAE.

With myAster, you have everything you need to take control of your health – from booking doctor visits to accessing an extensive online pharmacy. Your health journey is now easier, smarter, and more convenient than ever.

Why Choose myAster?
- Trusted by millions across the UAE.
-  Secure and effortless payment options.
- Integrated online pharmacy for health and wellness.

Download the myAster app today and experience healthcare like never before.

Follow myAster on:
Facebook: fb.com/myasterofficial
Instagram: @myasterofficial
Twitter: @myasterofficial
Youtube: youtube.com/@myasterofficial3041

We’d love to hear your feedback! Contact us at care@myaster.com

هذا التطبيق يعتبر البوابة الذكية لمؤسسة دبي لخدمات الإسعاف، يشمل عدة اقسام مثل (الخدمات الذكية، عن المؤسسة، المركز الاعلامي، الوظائف، واتصل بنا) ويمكن للمتعاملين الداخليين و الخارجيين الاطلاع على المعلومات والتقديم على الخدمات التي تقدمها المؤسسة

The NMC MyHealth app makes managing your medical appointments easy. Select your doctor, book an appointment, and manage your bookings, all with the tap of a few buttons. 

Features:
• View the profiles of NMC’s doctors and healthcare practitioners
• Search doctors by location, speciality, location, language, and gender
• Book your appointment 
• Reschedule or cancel a booking
• Receive appointment reminders
• Book and manage appointments for your family members

NMC Healthcare is the largest private healthcare provider in the UAE, with 85 hospitals and medical facilities in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, and Al Ain. Since 1975, we have provided high quality, personalised, and compassionate care to our patients, proudly earning the trust of millions of people in the UAE and around the world.NMC 

Our network is made up of 85 hospitals and medical facilities, including JCI-accredited, multi-specialty hospitals hospitals in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, and Al Ain, as well as medical centres, community clinics, day surgery centres, fertility clinics, home health services, and long-term care facilities throughout the UAE. 

The NMC Healthcare group also includes ProVita International Medical Centre, CosmeSurge, and Fakih IVF Fertility Centre - one of the leading in-vitro fertilization service providers worldwide.

NMC Healthcare - delivering personalised care that matters.

myNAS App is dedicated for NAS Cardholders. It is designed to provide access to useful functionalities and a range of information about their health Insurance policies. It is designed to enhance the member experience and to allow  access to key features including:
                -Search for a medical facility or Pharmacy.
                -Search for a physician in their network.
                -Access their policy information.
                -Check members’ promotions and special offers.
                -Book Appointment with your doctor.

developer: MEDICLINIC MIDDLE EAST MANAGEMENT SERVICES FZ LLC
description:
Your healthcare, simplified. From booking a doctor to checking your results, the Mediclinic app gives you instant, secure access to the care you need anytime, anywhere.

The Mediclinic Middle East app gives you secure, quick and easy access to the right care when you need it. It’s simple to set up and designed for a 
seamless experience.

Register using UAE Pass to get started. Book appointments with our doctors and access your digital healthcare tools right away.

After your first visit, you’ll see a clear overview of your medical information in the app, helping you stay on top of results, prescriptions and next steps.

Manage your care—and your family’s—in one secure place, with helpful alerts and options for earlier availability where possible.

Features:

• Book, reschedule and cancel appointments
• Get notifications when earlier slots open with your doctor
• Start on-demand virtual consultations
• Manage family profiles and appointments
• View test results, visit summaries and health history
• Track referrals for labs, imaging and specialist visits
• See current and past prescriptions
• Access personalized maternity care plans and pregnancy tracking
• Fast, secure login with UAE Pass
• Available in Arabic and English

We’re continuously improving the Mediclinic app to make your healthcare simpler and more connected.

For support: 800 2026 • mymediclinic24x7@mediclinic.ae

developer: National Health Insurance Company Daman PJSC
description:
This is the official mobile app of the National Health Insurance Company - Daman. As a Daman member, you can now conveniently and securely access our electronic services using your smart phone.



The Daman App comes with a host of features that simplify your health insurance:


-	The option to select your preferred language (English/Arabic)

-	Book an appointment with a doctor in your network across the UAE



1.	Search for providers and doctors based on availability, network coverage, proximity, and language preferences.


2.	Book an appointment directly from the app once you select your preferred medical provider.

3.	Reschedule or cancel any appointment directly from the app.



-	View and download digital insurance cards
-	One-click access to Daman's 24/7 customer care
-	Easy claim submissions using your smart phone
-	Locate nearby network hospitals and clinics on a map
-	Schedule of insurance and health policy coverage
-	Pre-approval tracking for medical procedures and pharmaceuticals
-	Simply manage your claims
-	Basic insurance renewal




Existing My Daman members can log in instantly using their username and password. Download and activate the app using your mobile number and ‘Get Started’ today. New members can quickly sign up and use our electronic services on the mobile and website with a single username and password.



For any technical issues or feedback, please call us on 800 432626 or email us on customerinfo@damanhealth.ae



We welcome your feedback and hope you enjoy our app.



National Health Insurance Company-Daman

Lumi – Your Trusted Health Companion
 
 
Whether you’re an Allianz-insured member, Nextcare-insured, or covered under a Nextcare-managed policy, Lumi makes managing your insurance effortless—your policy, benefits, and claims are just one tap away.
 
 
With Lumi, you can easily:
 
 
Download Your Digital Health Insurance Card for seamless access
 
Check Your Policy Benefits anytime, anywhere
 
Submit & Track Claims with ease
 
Easy Claims Processing: hassle-free reimbursement and preapproval processes
 
Lumi brings healthcare home with a caring Digital Health Assistant, 24/7 doctor access, easy appointment booking, AI-powered symptom checking, and convenient medication delivery.
 
 
Submit & Track Medical Claims Hassle-Free
 
Managing insurance claims is easier than ever. Upload your medical documents, submit your claim, and track its progress—all within the app. Once approved, receive reimbursements through your preferred payment method without unnecessary delays.
 
 
Take Charge of Your Health with Lumi’s Digital Services
 
We know your health is more than just insurance. Lumi offers a suite of digital health services designed to support your well-being.
 
 
Check Your Symptoms with Confidence
 
Lumi’s AI-powered Symptom Checker is an EU-certified medical device providing fast, reliable health insights. Whether you’re experiencing mild discomfort or unusual symptoms, this tool helps you assess your condition and make informed decisions—all from home or office.
 
 
Talk to a Doctor whenever you need
 
With Lumi’s Teleconsultation Service, expert multilingual doctors are just a tap away. Speak with doctors via secure video calls for consultations, prescription refills, and lab test requests.
 
 
Doctor Chat – Instant Medical Advice
 
Need quick guidance? Lumi’s Doctor Chat connects you to certified doctors via live chat, providing real-time answers to your non-emergency health concerns. With over 1,000 doctors available 24/7 in 13 languages across 19 countries, you’ll receive trusted advice whenever needed.
 
 
Private & Secure
 
Your medical information is handled with the highest confidentiality, ensuring a safe healthcare experience.
 
 
Get Your Medications Delivered to Your Door
 
Skip pharmacy lines with Lumi’s Medication Delivery Service—receive your prescribed medicines without hassle. Place your order through the app and have your medications delivered to your doorstep.
 
 
Find & Book Appointments with Ease
 
Need to see a doctor in person? Lumi’s Appointment Booking Service makes it easier than ever. Search from Over 21,000 Providers – Find doctors, clinics, hospitals, and pharmacies covered under your insurance. Filter by Specialty, Location & Network – Choose the right provider based on your needs.
 
 
Lumi connects you to quality care effortlessly—so you can focus on what matters most.
 
 
Get Instant Support with Zoe, Your Virtual Assistant
 
Need help navigating your insurance benefits or checking your claim status? Zoe, Lumi’s friendly virtual assistant, is available 24/7 to provide instant answers. It can help you find in-network healthcare providers, check claim status, and connect you to our Care Center for further assistance.
 
 
Why Lumi?
 
Simple to Use – Access essential features instantly and make the most of your policy. Fast & Efficient – Manage your healthcare quickly and easily. Seamless Access – Enjoy reliable, trustworthy healthcare services from home or office.
 
 
About Lumi
 
Lumi is designed to make healthcare simpler, smarter, and more accessible. Combining expertise with digital health innovations, we’re committed to supporting you every step of your healthcare journey. What sets Lumi apart is our focus on simplifying insurance management so you can concentrate on your health and life. Download Lumi today and experience a healthcare journey that fits your lifestyle.

Burjeel Health
Healthcare. Reimagined.

The all-new Burjeel Health app brings a beautiful, intuitive design to your healthcare experience. Access medical services across Burjeel, Medeor, Lifecare, LLH, and soon Tajmeel — all from a single, seamless interface.

A whole new way to manage your health. Beautiful by design. We've completely reimagined the Burjeel Health app with a focus on simplicity and elegance. Every detail has been carefully considered to give you the most intuitive healthcare experience possible.
Powerful by function. Behind the beautiful interface lies powerful technology that connects you to your complete healthcare journey across our network of premium facilities.
Everything you need. All in one place.

Teleconsultation
Connect with specialists through high-quality video calls, right from your device. Healthcare, without the wait.

Appointments
Book appointments with a tap. Filter by location, specialty, or availability. Simple.

Health Records
Your complete medical history, securely stored and instantly accessible. View test results, medical reports, and clinical documentation whenever you need them.

Medications
Track prescriptions, set reminders, and never miss a dose. Your medication schedule, simplified.

ONE OR
Search for surgical expertise by organ, procedure, or specialty. Connect with the right surgeon for your needs or request a second opinion — effortlessly.

Health Articles
Access a comprehensive library of health information, curated by medical professionals.

Health Metrics
Seamlessly integrates with Apple Health and Google Fit to keep your health data in perfect sync.

Special Offers
Discover exclusive healthcare packages and seasonal promotions designed for your wellbeing.

Your health. Your privacy.
Burjeel Health protects your personal information with industry-leading security. Your data remains private, secure, and always under your control.

Availability
Burjeel Health connects you to our network of premium healthcare facilities: Burjeel, Medeor, Lifecare, LLH, and soon Tajmeel.

For support: patient.experience@burjeel.com Website: www.burjeelholdings.com

developer: National Health Insurance Company Daman PJSC
description:
نسخة تطبيق الهواتف المحمولة الرسمية لبرنامج  ثقة بإدارة الشركة الوطنية للضمان الصحي. 
 نقدم لكم تطبيق ثقة كحل مبتكر يتيح لكم مجموعة من الخدمات والميزات التي صممت بعناية لتسهل لكم القيام بالتالي:
استعراض بطاقة التأمين الرقمية الخاصة بكم وبعائلتكم والتي تشتمل على معلومات مفصلة عن التغطية التأمينية الخاصة بكم
البحث في شبكة مزودي الخدمات الصحية المخصصة لبطاقتك واستعراض عناوين ومعلومات الاتصال الخاصة بهم
الاطلاع على مطالباتكم الطبية التي تم تقديمها من قبل مزودي الخدمات الصحية سابقا
تقديم المطالبات الطبية الخاصة بتعويض مبالغ تم دفعها من قلبكم
الاتصال بخدمات مركز أبو ظبي للتطبيب عن بعد
الاتصال مباشرة بالجهات التي تهمكم كمركز خدمة عملاء ثقة من داخل دولة الامارات العربية المتحدة، أو مركز خدمة عملاء ثقة من خارج دولة الامارات العربية المتحدة، أو مركز خدمة المساعدة الدولية في حالات الطوارئ 
يمكنكم تسجيل الدخول إلى التطبيق باستخدام حساب ثقة الخاص بكم أو الاشتراك للحصول على حساب جديد لتسجيل الدخول.
لإرسال ملاحظاتكم أو مقترحاتكم أو عند مواجهتكم لأي مشاكل تقنية متعلقة بالتطبيق يرجى الاتصال على:
800480000
أو مراسلتنا على:
customerinfo@damanhealth.ae

Dubai Health new App is your all-in-one portal to the Dubai Health services, allowing easy management of appointments, lab results, and prescriptions. Check medical fitness status and sign up for blood donation volunteering with bilingual support in English and Arabic. Simplify your healthcare experience in Dubai with this intuitive and user-friendly application.

Key features of the App:
•	Access medical records, including lab results, and prescriptions.
•	Book, manage and cancel appointments across  Dubai Health Facilities
•	Download attested sick leave certificates 
•	Real-time updates on medical fitness application status. 
•	Easy registration for blood donation, including detailed information on blood donation services. 
•	Interactive map to locate Dubai Health hospitals, health centers, specialty clinics, and fitness centers.
•	Multiple secure login options, including Dubai Health Account, UAE Pass, Touch ID, and Face ID.
•	Receive timely notifications and reminders to stay informed.
•	Add your dependents to easily manage their medical records.
•	Customize your home screen for a personalized app experience.
•	Upload and track health and fitness data, including data from the “Apple health app,” when enrolled in self-tracking programs

Keep an eye out for updates, as we are continuously improving your experience and expanding our range of services.

We are working towards making Dubai a Healthier and Happier community.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------


تطبيق دبي الصحية الجديد هو منصة ذكية شاملة توفر لكم جميع الخدمات الطبية المتوفرة في المنشآت التابعة لدبي الصحية، فمن خلاله تستطيعون الوصول للكثير من الخدمات المتنوعة بطريقة سهلة وسلسة.
تشمل هذه الخدمات: حجز المواعيد وإدارتها، الحصول على النتائج المخبرية ووصفات الأدوية، التأكد من حالة طلب فحص اللياقة الطبية، التسجيل والتطوع لخدمات التبرع بالدم، كل هذا وأكثر متوفر باللغتين العربية والانجليزية.




الخدمات المتوفرة على التطبيق: 
•	الاطلاع على السجلات الطبية – النتائج المخبرية، وصفات الأدوية
•	حجز، وإدارة، وإلغاء المواعيد الخاصة بالمنشآت الطبية التابعة لدبي الصحية
•	متابعة آنية لحالة طلب فحص اللياقة الطبية
•	تحميل شهادة الإجازة المرضية المصدقة  
•	التسجيل للتبرع بالدم، والحصول على كافة المعلومات عن خدمات التبرع بالدم
•	خريطة تفاعلية تساعد على البحث وتحديد أقرب المستشفيات، ومراكز الرعاية الأولية، والتخصصات الطبية ومراكز اللياقة الطبية التابعة لدبي الصحية
•	طرق متنوعة لتسجيل الدخول: باستخدام رقم البطاقة الصحية الصادرة من دبي الصحية MRN، أو باستخدام الهوية الرقمية الإماراتية، إضافة إلى إمكانية استخدام بصمة الإصبع أو خاصية التعرف على الوجه.
•	استلام الإشعارات والتذكيرات
•	إضافة حسابات أفراد العائلة لإدارة ملفاتهم الطبية
•	ترتيب الشاشة الرئيسية لكل أفراد العائلة لتجربة مشخصنة
•	تحميل وتتبع بيانات الصحة واللياقة البدنية، بما في ذلك عند التسجيل في ،'Apple Health' البيانات من تطبيق برامج التتبع الذاتي.



ترقّبوا المزيد، نعمل بشكل دوري على تحسين تجربتكم وإضافة تشكيلة خدمات جديدة تلبي كافة احتياجاتكم

نعمل لنجعل دبي أكثر صحة وسعادة

"With convenience, inclusivity, and customer delight at the fore of our efforts, the mySukoon app is designed to help our customers make the most of their insurance.

Previously available to Sukoon Insurance's health insurance customers, the app has been reimagined and redesigned to allow motor insurance customers the ability to manage their coverage in the palm of their hands as well.

What mySukoon offers
With the app, you can:
• Access information relevant to your insurance plan and make changes (like updating IBAN for faster claims payout).
• View, download and share your digital Health Card via its one-touch feature.
• Submit, track and manage claims in real time.
• Find and locate a provider within your network with turn-by-turn navigation.
• Find support or get the answers you seek.

Dubai Health Authority has revamped the DHA App to offer a unified platform for accessing a wide range of DHA services through a single, smart application. With this app, users can seamlessly access DHA's Smart Services, including a health dashboard for viewing appointment details, lab results, and medication information. Moreover, registered healthcare professionals gain access to dedicated Professional and Facility Dashboards through the same application.

Access Medical records – Appointment History, Lab Results and Medications
Access Professional Dashboard – License details and status, Update CPD points and violations.
Access Facility Dashboard – License details and status, Sick Leaves, Registered Professionals and Inspections.
Integrate with Health App (HealthKit) to track and manage your health data.
DHA news and circulars
Login Using DHA Account or UAE Pass along with Touch ID and Face ID
 
Stay Tuned, as we will be adding more Services regularly to enhance your experience

TruDoc offers a one-stop-care-destination for people who are healthy, acute, or chronic through different entry points including Integrated Mobile Application, Virtual Clinic, Hospital at Home Program and Hospitalist Program that are all connected to our 24x7 Doctor Call Center.

TruDoc integrated mobile application allows you to speak to a TruDoc doctor via voice/video call and live chat.


Services: 
• Teleconsultation 
• Medication prescription and delivery, where available
• Lab tests, where available
• Referrals and appointment booking, if required
• Holistic care including nutrition care and mental health care

Features: 

• 24x7 access to doctors through voice/video call and live chat
• Multilingual team (English, Arabic, Hindi or Urdu)
• Vital signs monitoring
• Health articles and tips
• Appointment tracker
• Medication reminders
• On-demand access to dietitians and psychologists
• We integrate with the health app (HealthKit) to read and track your steps data and show them in a beautiful way.

Download ‘TruDoc’ app now to access our services.

Discover our other entry points: 

• TruDoc’s on-site and virtual clinics can be made available in different locations including corporate offices, staff accommodation, pharmacies, schools, malls, nursing homes, hotels, etc. 

• TruDoc’s Hospital at Home Program with 24x7 telemonitoring, provides acute and chronic care at the comfort of home. Individuals are monitored 24x7 by our Doctor Call Center through TruDoc’s integrated connected devices. Doctors and nurses are available to visits 24/7.

• TruDoc’s Hospitalist/Roaming doctors Program coordinates the care in the hospital and serves as a liaison between patient, family, and the treating doctor.

For more information, visit www.trudocgroup.com.

Prime HealthCare Group is amongst the UAE’s leading healthcare provider with a team of over 350 physicians and 1000 supporting professionals providing state-of-the-art medical care to UAE’s citizens and residents. “Personalized care, personally” – is our underpinning culture that drives every individual in the organization to ensure quality service to our patients. This along with our core values of Ownership, Team work, Customer focus, Quality Consciousness, Cost Consciousness, Staff Recognition & Rewards and Speed of action has helped us achieve prestigious awards and accreditations including, JCI accreditation 2016, Voted UAE's choice Superbrand 2016, Winner of Dubai Quality Appreciation Award 2012, Winner of Sharjah Economic Excellence Award 2010, Winner of Dubai Quality Appreciation Program 2007 and Certified ISO 15189 & ISO 9001 – 2008.
 
Primehealth ME App provides as easy access to your visits details, lab results, prescription and much more. Some of the key features of the Primehealth ME App are:
 
·         Doctor Information and Profile
·         Branch location and navigation
·         Appointment reminders
·         History of visit(s) along with prescription
·         Medication reminders
·         Vaccination schedule for children
·         Health Tips
·         Request for Appointment

Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi’s Patient Portal app represents part of our commitment to provide you with secure, quick and easy access to the right level of care when you need it. This app is free to install and use as well as safe and secure. The installation and sign-up process is simple. 
 
Register on our patient portal app using your activation code and immediately start scheduling appointments with our doctors and gain access to all of our digital healthcare features. 
 
Once you’ve completed your first appointment, you would be able to see a comprehensive overview of your medical information in the Patient Portal app. 
 
Message your doctor, view your medical test results and records in addition to the ability to manage your medication refills, securely and safely through the Patient Portal app. 
 
Features: 
 
• Schedule and track appointments 
 
• View your health history and medication 
 
• Message your doctor with non-urgent clinical questions or concerns, and receive a reply directly through the app 
 
• View your latest test results 
 
• Request prescription refills and be informed when they are ready for pick-up at the hospital pharmacy 
 
• Receive helpful reminders 
 
• Connect your account to Apple Health to pull health-related data from your personal device right into the CCAD patient portal app 
 
Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi will continue to add regular updates to the Patient Portal app, aiming to build one of the most interactive and innovative services available in the UAE. 
 
To provide suggestions or feedback on the app, please get in touch at 800 8 2223 (+971 2 659 0200 from outside the UAE) or send an email to info@clevelandclinicabudhabi.ae. 



يمثل تطبيق بوابة المراجع من كليفلاند كلينك أبوظبي جزءاً من التزامنا تجاهك للحصول على إمكانية الوصول الآمن والسريع والسهل إلى المستوى المناسب من الرعاية عند الحاجة إليها. يمكن تحميل تطبيق بوابة المراجع مجاناً وهو آمن وسهل الاستخدام، حيث تتسم عملية التسجيل وتحميل التطبيق بالسهولة. 
 
قم بتحميل التطبيق للبدء فوراً في طلب المواعيد والاستفادة من نموذج الرعاية الخاص بكليفلاند كلينك أبوظبي. 
 
بمجرد الانتهاء من أول موعد لك في كليفلاند كلينك أبوظبي، سيزودك تطبيق بوابة المراجع بلمحة عامة عن معلوماتك الطبية. 
 
بوسعك مراسلة طبيبك، واستعراض فحوصاتك الطبية وسجلاتك بالإضافة إلى القدرة على إدارة الوصفات الطبية الخاصة بك بأمان من خلال تطبيق بوابة المراجع. 
 
الخصائص: 
 
• حجز ومتابعة المواعيد 
 
• الاطلاع على التاريخ الطبي والدوائي 
 
• مراسلة طبيبك بشأن الأمور الطبية غير العاجلة والحصول على الرد من خلال التطبيق
 
• الاطلاع على أحدث نتائج الفحوصات 
 
• طلب تجديد الوصفات الطبية وإعلامك بأوقات الاستلام من صيدلية المستشفى 
 
• تلقي ارشادات مفيدة 
 
• قم بربط حسابك بتطبيق  Apple Health لنقل البيانات الصحية من جهازك الشخصي إلى حسابك في تطبيق بوابة المراجع من كليفلاند كلينك أبوظبي.
 
ستواصل كليفلاند كلينك أبوظبي إضافة تحديثات منتظمة إلى تطبيق بوابة المراجع، بهدف تقديم واحدة من أكثر الخدمات التفاعلية والمبتكرة المتاحة في دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة. لتقديم الاقتراحات أو التعليقات على التطبيق، يرجى الاتصال بالرقم 2223-8-800 (أو 0200-659-2-971+ من خارج دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة) أو إرسال رسالة إلكترونية إلى العنوان info@clevelandclinicabudhabi.ae.

MyMedcare
Your Health Journey, Simplified
 
Medcare Hospitals & Medical Centres introduce the MyMedcare app, designed to make your hospital and clinic visits as smooth as possible. From booking appointments to accessing your medical records, including lab tests and results, everything is now at your fingertips. With this app, you can easily manage your health journey from the convenience of your phone.
 
Key Features:
 
Appointment Management
Book and manage clinic appointments with doctors from Medcare Hospitals & Medical Centres.
Search and filter doctors by specialty, location, and language to find the perfect match for your needs.
View a doctor’s live calendar to find and select the most convenient time for your visit.
Reschedule or cancel appointments with ease, and receive instant confirmation via push notification and email.
 
Access Lab Reports & Results
 
Stay informed about your health with secure access to your lab tests and results:
View your lab reports instantly on your phone.
Download and save reports for your records.
Track your results over time for better health insights.
 
Why Choose MyMedcare?
 
Find and book appointments with world-class doctors and specialists across all Medcare facilities.
Our app makes finding and booking your next consultation incredibly simple and fast.
You have full control to manage your bookings and access your lab reports, ensuring your healthcare fits your schedule.
 
Download the MyMedcare app today to take control of your appointments.

Welcome to Dawak, the ultimate digital pharmacy app that revolutionizes medication management. Dawak empowers you to take control of your prescriptions, improve adherence, and enjoy unparalleled convenience. 

Effortless Medication Management: 

Stay informed about your medications that are due for a refill. 

Our app automatically tracks your medication usage and knows when a refill is due. Our system verifies and processes your prescriptions accurately, saving you time and effort. Say goodbye to long queues at the pharmacy! 

Personalized Pill Packaging: 

Enjoy the convenience of personalized pill packaging. Dawak organizes your medications into date and time-specific sachets, ensuring easy adherence. 

Insurance Integration: 

Dawak seamlessly integrates with your insurance provider, streamlining the approval process. Check your insurance coverage and instantly view co-payment amounts.  

Convenient Home Delivery: 

Experience the ease of home delivery. Dawak offers hassle-free delivery, saving you time and providing peace of mind. Schedule preferred delivery time slots and track your package for a seamless experience. 

Medication Reminders: 

Never miss a dose with Dawak's reminders. Our app sends personalized notifications to keep you on track and improve your health outcomes. 

Simplify your healthcare journey with Dawak. Download the app today and experience the future of digital pharmacy.

Clinical Decision Support for Healthcare Professionals (NPI Required).

OpenEvidence is the world’s leading medical information platform for health care professionals, providing accurate and efficient answers at the point of care. Every answer on OpenEvidence is always sourced, cited, and grounded in the peer-reviewed medical literature.

Now featuring New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) published content, NEJM multimedia content, and NEJM invited review articles authored by the world’s leading clinical experts.

• 160 medical specialties
• 1,000+ diseases and therapeutic areas
• 1m+ medical topics

Trusted by medical professionals at 10,000+ care centers across the United States.

OpenEvidence is only available for health care professionals. Users must verify their health care professional status before using OpenEvidence.

AS SEEN IN

Forbes: “OpenEvidence Keeps Doctors Up To Date On The Latest Science”

TESTIMONIALS

“I've been using OpenEvidence for the last week - it has been amazing! Able to narrow down on results quickly and find information that I wasn't able to do with Google/PubMed searches on my own.” - Dr. John Lee, MD. Physician & Faculty Member, Harvard Medical School

“OpenEvidence can be the foundational technology to power all clinical decision tools.” - Dr. Antonio Jorge Forte, MD. Director of MayoExpert, Mayo Clinic

“OpenEvidence is more up-to-date than UpToDate. And more useful regardless, since it’s interactive, and you can ask it questions, and get very specific answers about specific medical fact patterns in a patient case. The King’s Hub App is the personal healthcare companion of King’s College Hospital London in Dubai. It provides real-time access to your appointments, results, prescriptions, education materials and more. Keep track of all your medical needs and records – wherever you are, whenever you need.
Key features include:
•	Login using UAE pass
•	Appointment booking and self check-in via Emirates ID
•	Digital Queue management, updates and wait-time displays
•	Hospital navigation with mobile-accessible static maps
•	Lab/imaging results, discharge summaries and prescriptions
•	Digital forms and consents
•	Secure messaging with care teams
•	Patient education material and health tips
•	Real-time notification and offers
